title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 129 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 129 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）以色列当说，从我幼年以来，敌人屡次苦害我，

lineList.en: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
lineList.cn: 从我幼年以来，敌人屡次苦害我，却没有胜了我。

lineList.en: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
lineList.cn: 如同扶犁的在我背上扶犁而耕，耕的犁沟甚长。

lineList.en: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是公义的。他砍断了恶人的绳索。

lineList.en: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
lineList.cn: 愿恨恶锡安的，都蒙羞退后。

lineList.en: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
lineList.cn: 愿他们像房顶上的草，未长成而枯乾。

lineList.en: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
lineList.cn: 收割的不够一把，捆禾的也不满怀。

lineList.en: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 过路的也不说，愿耶和华所赐的福，归与你们。我们奉耶和华的名，给你们祝福。
